title: Yuushibu
alternative_title: Yuusha ni Narenakatta Ore wa Shibushibu Shuushoku wo Ketsui Shimashita., Yusibu: I couldnt become a hero, so I reluctantly decided to get a job., 勇者になれなかった俺はしぶしぶ就職を決意しました。
description: Yuushibu Is The story revolves around Raul, a boy who did not become a Hero, since the demon lord was already defeated just before his Hero exams. His dreams dashed, Raul spends his days working at a magic shop in the capital. One day, a part-time job seeker appears at the shop with an amazing résumé:Name: PhinoPrevious Occupation: Demon Lord HeirMotive: Because my father was defeatedThe work comedy revolves around this former Hero-in-training and the daughter of the demon lord.
